plot: Only those from noble families have the mana to be able to fight against monsters. Kūfa is a noble born to a duke's family who is sent to tutor a young woman named Merida. If it turns out that Merida has no talent with mana, Kūfa is secretly instructed to assassinate her. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Share the light" by Run Girls, Run!
ending_theme: "Ijin-tachi no Jikan" (Time of Foreigners) by Tomori Kusunoki
